catalog_info.title: Music History and Repertory: Music in Cross-Cultural Perspective
catalog_info.notes: Music 97 is required of all concentrators, preferably taken in the sophomore year, or earlier by permission. There are no pre-requisites. Students from other departments are warmly invited.
catalog_info.description: An introduction to selected world music repertories, as well as research methods and interpretive issues in the field of ethnomusicology.
